headline: Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan Calls 2025 'Defining Year' As Stock Soars 79%, Nvidia And SoftBank Deals Fuel Turnaround Despite Trump Conflict
summary: On Friday, Intel Corp (NASDAQ:INTC) CEO Lip-Bu Tan said 2025 marked a pivotal turning point for the chipmaker as major AI funding deals and a sharp stock rally helped reshape the company amid political scrutiny. Tan Touts Cultural Reset And Renewed Focus At Intel Tan took to X and described 2025 as a "defining year" for the company, pointing to internal changes, renewed execution discipline and growing confidence from customers and partners. In a year-end message, Intel’s CEO said he was "deeply
